file.name: base.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.1

info:
  version: 0.3.0
  title: WMF MobileApps service
  description: |
    (aka Mobile Content Service and Page Content Service).
    A collection of REST API services supporting Wikimedia Foundation (WMF) Readers products.
    https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Wikimedia_Apps/Team/RESTBase_services_for_apps
  termsOfService: https://wikimediafoundation.org/wiki/Terms_of_Use
  contact:
    name: the Wikimedia Foundation Reading Infrastructure team.
    url: https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Wikimedia_Reading_Infrastructure_team
  license:
    name: Apache2
    url: http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0

x-default-params:
  domain: en.wikipedia.org

paths:
  # from routes/root.js
  /robots.txt:
    get:
      tags:
        - Root
      description: Gets robots.txt
      responses:
        200:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/success'
        default:
          $ref: "#/components/responses/problem"
      x-monitor: false

  /:
    get:
      tags:
        - Root
      description: The root service end-point
      responses:
        200:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/success'
        default:
          $ref: "#/components/responses/problem"
      x-amples:
        - title: spec from root
          request:
            query:
              spec: true
          response:
            status: 200

  # from routes/info.js
  /_info:
    get:
      tags:
        - Root
      description: Gets information about the service.
      responses:
        200:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/success'
        default:
          $ref: "#/components/responses/problem"
      x-amples:
        - title: retrieve service info
          request: {}
          response:
            status: 200
            headers:
              content-type: application/json
            body:
              name: /.+/
              description: /.+/
              version: /.+/
              home: /.+/

Error: parse: parse spec: parse operations: paths: /: get: operation "": responses: 200: resolve "#/components/responses/success" reference: component by reference "#/components/responses/success" not found
